text: 🏥💔 Healthcare affordability is a pressing issue, isn't it? As a society, we've grown accustomed to expecting top-notch medical care, yet the cost keeps climbing higher. It's a conundrum that demands our attention.💡 Free-market principles can offer a solution. Competition drives innovation and efficiency, leading to better care and lower prices. But gov't intervention has skewed the market, creating a complex web of regulations and subsidies that stifle competition and drive up costs.💔 I'm not heartless. I understand the plight of those who can't afford healthcare. But the gov't isn't the answer. Expanding gov't programs only leads to more debt, higher taxes, and less personal freedom.💡 Instead, let's focus on empowering individuals to make informed choices about their healthcare.
